translation.en: [whispers] Watch it.
[Roland groans] Amateurs.
Now you know I hate to question your decisions, Miriam, but--
translation.fr: Sans vouloirremettre en cause tes décisions…

translation.en: Do I look like the kind of fool dumb enough to storm a mage tower?
translation.fr: Ai-je l'air assez bêtepour attaquer une tour de mage ?

translation.en: They were Dolph's idea.
You mean he wants those idiots and the two of us
translation.fr: Donc il veut que nous deux et ces idiots

translation.en: to fight our way through that entire building,
steal a case of lyrium and fight our way back out again?
translation.fr: volions une caisse de lyriumet nous enfuyions ?

translation.en: What's your plan? [grunts]
[Miriam] Bribed the washer woman.
All we really needed were a couple of mage robes
and, uh, you know,
translation.fr: ce sont des robes de mage,

translation.en: a distraction.
Dolph will be livid.
Yeah. Probably.
[Dolph] Stupid, blasted knife-ear!
Just couldn't stick to the plan, could ya, elf?
translation.fr: T'aurais pas pu suivre le plan ?

translation.en: Always so sure you know better.
I got the lyrium, Dolph.
Yeah, and got three recruits jailed,
including my nephew.
If they couldn't get past two guards, they never could have taken a mage tower.
translation.fr: Ils avaient pas les capacitéspour prendre d'assaut une tour de mage.

translation.en: Hey, it's me you're angry with, not Roland.
translation.fr: Laisse-le,c'est contre moi que t'es en colère.

translation.en: Yeah, damn right, I am!
You know, half my men seem to think you are the one in charge here.
translation.fr: La moitié de mes hommespensent que t'es aux commandes.

translation.en: And he's the worst.
translation.fr: Et lui est pire que toi.

translation.en: You're still the boss.
I hope we are not interrupting anything.
Sapphira?
Hey, Miri. You kept the scarf.
No. No! You don't just get to… [scoffs]
translation.fr: Non ! T'as pas le droit de…

translation.en: -[Hira] I know. -Not after you just left.
-I'm sorry, but-- -I don't care about your apologies.
translation.fr: - Désolée…- Je me fous de tes excuses.

translation.en: Please, not here.
Who are you?
Ah, sorry about that. They, uh, have history.
We are the ones that commissioned this little robbery.
translation.fr: C'est nous qui avons commanditéce braquage.

translation.en: Oh, Master Fairbanks. So nice to finally meet you in person.
translation.fr: Maître Fairbanks.Ravi de vous rencontrer en personne.

translation.en: -Uh, sorry about-- -No apologies necessary.
The lyrium was only to see if you were as good as Hira promised.
translation.fr: Le lyrium, c'était pour testervos compétences, et vous deux,

translation.en: And you are. Uh, both of you.
Which is why I'd like to offer you both a job.
Hey! Customer or not,
nobody does anything in Dolph's Daggers without Dolph's say-so.
translation.fr: tout le monde icidoit faire ce que je dis.

translation.en: I suggest you take it.
You see, I already told the City Guard where to find the missing lyrium.
translation.fr: J'ai déjà dit aux gardes de la villeoù retrouver le lyrium.

translation.en: The entire garrison is on its way right now.
translation.fr: Toute la garnison est en route.

translation.en: You did what?
Kill him! Kill them all!
[pants] Both of you, stay down.
This isn't about you, Miriam.
-Stand aside. -[straining] No.
[pants] The Guard is coming, Hasem.
Your children need their father,
and I will kill every one of you before I let you touch her. I swear it.
translation.fr: Je vous tuerai tousavant de vous laisser la toucher.

translation.en: -Do you understand me? -[straining]
-[Miriam] Do you understand? -[straining]
Daggers, move out.
No, no, no! She is not the boss! I am!
Finish them off!
Next time, aim a little more to the right.
translation.fr: La prochaine fois,vise un peu plus à droite.

translation.en: Seems like a good time for a new venture.
translation.fr: C'est le bon momentpour une nouvelle aventure.

translation.en: -[bell tolling] -Miriam! Wait.
You were magnificent, you know that?
Not enough to stop you from leaving me to join the Inquisition.
I asked you to come.
But there was a demon-spewing hole in the sky.
Somebody had to stop it from destroying the world.
But you didn't!
The Herald of Andraste sealed the breach. They killed Corypheus.
translation.fr: Le Héraut d'Andrasté a scellé la brèche.Ils ont tué Corypheus.

translation.en: People like us don't change the world, Hira.
translation.fr: Les gens comme nouschangent pas le monde, Hira.

translation.en: Because people like you never try!
Listen, I know I'm asking a lot,
translation.fr: Je sais que j'en demande beaucoup,

translation.en: but the Inquisition gave me one last mission before it broke up
translation.fr: mais l'Inquisitionm'a confié une dernière mission

translation.en: and I need your help to do it.
translation.fr: et j'ai besoin de ton aide.

translation.en: And after this, we can go to the Hinterlands
translation.fr: Et après ça,on pourra aller aux Marches solitaires

translation.en: and make cheese for all I care, so long as we're together.
translation.fr: et vivre une vie simple ensemble.

translation.en: What's the job?
Let's meet the rest of the team first.
Roland, Miriam, this is Qwydion,
translation.fr: Roland, Miriam, voici Qwydion,mage rebelle et guérisseuse talentueuse.

translation.en: a rebel mage and a talented healer.
translation.fr: voici Qwydion,mage rebelle et guérisseuse talentueuse.

translation.en: And that's Lacklon.
Lord of Fortune and a talented… whatever the opposite of healer is.
translation.fr: Seigneur de Fortune…et le contraire d'un guérisseur.

translation.en: I'm not like a real rebel, you know.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas une vraie rebelle.

translation.en: My passion is more elemental magic, like explosions. [chuckles]
translation.fr: Ma passion, c'est la magie élémentaire,comme les explosions.

translation.en: But people pay you more to blow stuff up if it's for something they believe in, so…
translation.fr: Les gens me paient pour faire exploserdes trucs selon leurs convictions.

translation.en: Nice to meet you.
Eh, we'll see, right?
Three experienced fighters, two mages, and yourself?
translation.fr: Trois combattants expérimentés,deux mages et toi ?

translation.en: This job must be dangerous.
It is.
Before the Inquisition ended,
we learned the Tevinter Chantry was in possession of an artifact.
translation.fr: que la Chantrie Tévintidepossédait un certain artefact.

translation.en: The Circulum Infinitus.
What's a Circu, whatever it is, do?
translation.fr: À quoi sert ce Circu… chose ?

translation.en: No idea. I'm not a mage, but in the words of Cassandra Pentaghast…
translation.fr: Aucune idée. Je ne suis pas mage,mais selon Cassandra Pentaghast…

translation.en: It does not matter.
All you need to know is that it is an extremely dangerous artifact
translation.fr: Sachez seulementqu'il est dangereux et alimenté

translation.en: fueled by blood magic.
And I, for one, cannot recall any good
translation.fr: Et rien de bon ne découle jamais

translation.en: coming from something powered by murder.
translation.fr: d'une chose alimentée par le meurtre.

translation.en: The Inquisition told Hira and I to steal the Circulum
translation.fr: L'Inquisition nous a ditde voler le Circulum

translation.en: and deliver it to Orlais.
translation.fr: et de le livrer à Orlaïs.

translation.en: We tracked it to an old summer palace belonging to the Tevinter Divine,
translation.fr: Il se trouverait dans un ancien palaisdu Divin de Tévinter,

translation.en: the head of their faith.
It's being studied by a Magister named Rezaren--
[Fairbanks] Know this guy?
And the palace is in the city of Nessum.
translation.fr: Et le palais est dans la ville de Nessum.

translation.en: [chuckles dryly] That's why you needed me.
Yes, but only because there was no other option.
translation.fr: Oui, mais seulementcar il n'y avait pas d'autre choix.

translation.en: We have a very small window of time.
translation.fr: On a très peu de temps.

translation.en: You're the only person outside Tevinter that's ever been in that building.
translation.fr: Tu es une des rares personnesà connaître ce bâtiment.

translation.en: You know its layout, its defenses.
You're our only hope of pulling this off, Miriam.
translation.fr: Tu es notre seul espoir de réussir.

translation.en: Will you help us,
please?
No.
[Hira] Miriam, wait.
[Miriam] I told you I never go back there and… [chuckles sadly] …yet here you come,
translation.fr: Je t'avais ditque j'y retournerais jamais, et pourtant,

translation.en: spinning a fairy tale about our happy cheese-making future
translation.fr: tu me racontes un conte de féessur notre avenir

translation.en: just so you can use me.
You're right. I should have told you everything, and for that, I'm sorry.
translation.fr: Tu as raison. J'aurais dû tout te dire,et je suis désolée.

translation.en: But I think you might need this mission as much as I do.
translation.fr: Mais tu as besoinde cette mission autant que moi.

translation.en: You have to stop running from the past, Miri.
translation.fr: Tu dois arrêter de fuir le passé, Miri.

translation.en: If you can't do it now, I worry that maybe you never will.
translation.fr: Si tu ne peux pas le faire maintenant,je crains que tu ne le fasses jamais.

translation.en: And I can't live like that.
translation.fr: Je peux pas vivre comme ça.

translation.en: [sighs] I won't set foot in that place.
translation.fr: Je n'y remettrai pas les pieds.

translation.en: And I'd never ask you to. Just show us a way in.
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas à venir. Fais-nous juste entrer.

translation.en: Let me help you take something back from those bastards
translation.fr: Laissez-moi t'aiderà te venger de ces salauds

translation.en: and we can live happily ever after.
Together?
Together.
[Fairbanks] It's easy to think Tevinter is the same as any other country.
translation.fr: Tévinter n'est pascomme n'importe quel autre pays.

translation.en: But it's not.
Magic rules there, and those who have it rule everyone else.
translation.fr: La magie y règne,et ceux qui la possèdent aussi.

translation.en: The Templars don't protect people from mages who turn evil.
translation.fr: Les Templiers ne protègent pas le peupledes mauvais mages.

translation.en: Instead, they act as enforcers for powerful mages called Magisters.
translation.fr: Ce sont des exécuteursau service des magisters.

translation.en: They have their own religion, the Imperial Chantry,
translation.fr: Ils ont leur propre religion,la Chantrie impériale,

translation.en: and their own magic-wielding Divine to lead it.
translation.fr: et leur propre Divin qui la pratique.

translation.en: Qunari are hated, and most elves live in outright slavery.
translation.fr: Les Qunari sont détestés, et la plupartdes elfes vivent en esclavage.

translation.en: Blood magic, raised corpses, and demons may be frowned on officially,
translation.fr: La magie du sang, les revenantset les démons sont mal vus,

translation.en: but Magisters are the officials,
translation.fr: mais les magisters font la loi

translation.en: so they tend to turn a blind eye towards anyone with power.
translation.fr: et ont tendance à fermer les yeuxsur ces choses-là.

translation.en: Since we're robbing The Divine himself, well, let's stay on our toes, huh?
translation.fr: Puisqu'on vole au Divin lui-même,restons sur nos gardes.

translation.en: I shit you not.
It was just a hairy nug the whole time.
translation.fr: En fait, c'était juste un truc poilu.

translation.en: I can get up by my damn self.
You wanna help? Tell the world's tallest elf to slow down.
translation.fr: Dis plutôt à l'elfe géante de ralentir.

translation.en: Hey, man, you can't blame someone for not wanting to spend a lot of time in a country that enslaved her.
translation.fr: Ce pays l'a asservie,normal qu'elle veuille se dépêcher.

translation.en: What? Isn't she a runaway?
[chuckles] Don't be dense. Fairbanks would never be stupid enough to hire a runaway. Right?
translation.fr: Fairbanks ne serait pas assez bêtepour engager une fugitive. Pas vrai ?

translation.en: She's an elf from Tevinter.
I've left it at that. I suggest you do the same.
translation.fr: Ça me suffit,et ça devrait te suffire.

translation.en: You can't be serious.
What if Little Miss Wayfinder's still being hunted?
translation.fr: Et si elle est toujours recherchée ?

translation.en: What if she loses her nerve as soon as she sees home?
translation.fr: Et si elle perdait son sang-froid,là-bas ?

translation.en: Watch your tongue, dwarf.
translation.fr: Attention à ce que tu dis.

translation.en: Whatever I am, I've survived things
that make the deep roads look like a pleasant stroll.
translation.fr: qui font de ces routesune promenade agréable.

translation.en: And I assure you, you'll lose your nerve long before I will.
translation.fr: Je t'assure,tu perdras ton sang-froid bien avant moi.

translation.en: So lengthen your stride and shut the fuck up!
translation.fr: Alors ta gueule et marche plus vite.

translation.en: That hurt me a little.
-[Qwydion giggles] -[scoffs] Blasted elfin hearing.
What are you smiling at, horn-head?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu souris, tête à cornes ?

translation.en: If you don't take him, I will.
translation.fr: Si tu le veux pas, je le prends.

translation.en: Wow, it's beautiful.
So is a mage's staff right before it shoots fire at you.
translation.fr: Comme le bâton d'un magejuste avant qu'il vous tire dessus.

translation.en: [guard] Hold. State your business.
-Ah, my wife and I are from Carastes. -[coughs]
translation.fr: Ma femme et moi venons de Carastes.

translation.en: She has bellows cough,
and we're following the Pilgrimage of Divine Adnias with our servants
translation.fr: on suit le pèlerinage du Divin Adniasavec nos serviteurs

translation.en: in hopes that she might be healed.
Any elf must post a five-gold bond in case they break the peace.
translation.fr: Tout elfe doit payer cinq pièces d'or.En cas de rupture de la paix.

translation.en: -Wha-- Five gold? -[blow thuds]
Light of the Maker shine upon you.
translation.fr: Que la lumière du Créateurbrille sur vous.

translation.en: And you as well.
Uh, a month's wages to get through the gate? They might as well just rob us outright.
translation.fr: Un mois de salaire pour passerles portes ? C'est un vol !

translation.en: We won't be here for long, okay?
[stammers] Uh, I know. It's just…
[sighs heavily] …every breath I take here is one too many.
translation.fr: chaque minute passée ici est de trop.

translation.en: [Fairbanks] Well then,
we should get to work.
[Miriam] They may call it a summer palace,
translation.fr: Ils appellent ça un palais d'été,

translation.en: but it's actually three different structures joined together.
translation.fr: mais il s'agitde trois structures reliées.

translation.en: The cathedral is at the top. No way in there except from the palace itself.
translation.fr: La cathédrale est au sommet.Le seul accès est via le palais.

translation.en: Below that, the whole place is a maze of secret passages,
translation.fr: En dessous, c'est un labyrinthede passages secrets

translation.en: easy to get lost in.
And it's all built atop a sealed temple to the old gods.
translation.fr: Tout est construit au sommet d'un templedédié aux anciens dieux.

translation.en: It'll take time to find a way in.
[Fairbanks] Don't worry. I've got a place.
[Miriam] I'll need all the time you can give.
The furniture is all High Imperium, of course,
translation.fr: Les meubles sont du haut de gamme,

translation.en: and the estate features a generous private courtyard
translation.fr: et vous avez accès à une cour privée

translation.en: that I'm sure your bride will love.
[Miriam] If the smuggler routes are closed, there are discreet ways into the palace itself.
translation.fr: Il existe des passages discretspour entrer au palais.

translation.en: [Fairbanks] You mean one of the Divines was involved in something illicit?
translation.fr: Donc un des Divins était impliquédans quelque chose d'illégal ?

translation.en: I am shocked.
[Miriam] Even if this Divine isn't, they could still be usable.
translation.fr: Il est possiblequ'on puisse encore les emprunter.

translation.en: I don't like the sound of "could."
Well, neither do I, but I'm not the only one with a job to do, am I?
translation.fr: Moi non plus,mais vous avez tous un rôle à jouer.

translation.en: You're right. We'll strike during the evening service.
translation.fr: On agira pendant le service du soir.Qwydion et moi…

translation.en: -Qwydion and I-- -The magic mavens.
Will ensure everyone in the cathedral stays put during the robbery.
translation.fr: On surveillera la cathédralependant le braquage.

translation.en: [chuckles] I mean, naturally, but that's gonna take a lot of magic.
translation.fr: Bien sûr,mais ça va demander beaucoup de magie.

translation.en: So, uh, we should stock up to be safe, right?
translation.fr: On devrait faire des réserves, non ?

translation.en: I mean, we don't want to run out in the middle of things.
Don't you think a Qunari buying a small arsenal of magic weapons
translation.fr: Une Qunari achetantun petit arsenal d'armes magiques

translation.en: might attract some attention?
Oh, it's not about attracting attention.
translation.fr: Ce qui est important, c'est surtout

translation.en: -[power hums] -It's about what kind. [chuckles]
Yes, can I help you?
Oh, I certainly hope so.
My master is new in town and he sent me to fetch
translation.fr: Mon maître est nouveau en villeet il m'a envoyé chercher

translation.en: lyrium, healing potions, knockout powder, arcane grenades of all kinds,
translation.fr: du lyrium, des potions de guérison,des grenades…

translation.en: and, um, everything else on this list.
What in the name of Andraste does he need all this for?
translation.fr: Pourquoi a-t-il besoin de tout ça ?

translation.en: [whispering] Two words. The Blight.
Master barely survived the last one,
and his bad knee says another one's on the way. Oh, yeah.
translation.fr: et son genou souffranten annonce un autre.

translation.en: And if you think I'd let a bunch of mindless, murderous monsters
translation.fr: Et je ne laisserai jamaisune bande de monstres

translation.en: touch a hair on that sweet bald head of his, you've got another thing coming.
translation.fr: toucher un cheveu de sa tête chauve.

translation.en: You know, I have some more exotic defense items in the back.
translation.fr: J'ai d'autres objets de défense…exotiques à l'arrière.

translation.en: Show me.
[Roland] Where exactly do Lacklon and I fit in?
translation.fr: Lacklon et moi, on fait quoi ?

translation.en: -[both grunting] -[Lacklon] Ain't it obvious? We're the muscle.
[Fairbanks] You take out the guards and watch my back in the vault.
translation.fr: Élimine les gardeset surveille mes arrières.

translation.en: Not to mention, make sure everyone else gets out alive.
translation.fr: On s'assurera que tout le monde survive.

translation.en: I need you both in perfect sync. Think you can handle that?
translation.fr: Vous devrez être en parfaite harmonie.Compris ?

translation.en: If you're trying to distract me, it won't work.
translation.fr: Si tu essaies de me distraire,ça ne marchera pas.

translation.en: Besides, your girlfriend's still got to find a way into the palace. [Roland] Hmm?
translation.fr: Et ta copine doit encore trouver un moyend'entrer au palais.

translation.en: I don't have a girlfriend.
[Lacklon] Let's remember, it all means precisely squat if we can't find a way in.
translation.fr: Si on ne trouve pas un moyen d'entrer,tout est foutu.

translation.en: I'll find it.
I will.
[clears throat] You're in my seat, elf.
translation.fr: Tu es à ma place, elfe.

translation.en: There a reason for that?
I'm sorry, is this more important than listening to me?
translation.fr: Pardon, c'est plus importantque de m'écouter ?

translation.en: [hesitantly] Of course not, sir.
Apologies.
We have a problem, friend?
Yes, I think this elf's a runaway slave, with stolen property no less.
translation.fr: Oui, je pense que cette elfe estune esclave en fuite avec des biens volés.

translation.en: That's not true, sir. Please, don't turn me in to the guard.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas vrai.Ne me dénoncez pas.

translation.en: Sorry, elf, you're coming with me.
translation.fr: Désolé, elfe, tu viens avec moi.

translation.en: Keep walking.
They can't look at the plans.
translation.fr: Ils doivent pas voir les plans.

translation.en: Fair play on that one.
If you share her, I can pay you for it.
translation.fr: Si tu la partages, je peux te payer.

translation.en: -I don't like your implication, friend. -[men laughing]
Ugh, don't tell me you care about some bat-faced bitch's honor!
translation.fr: Tu te soucies de l'honneurde cette garce ?

translation.en: Guess I do.
Let's go! Come on!
Hey, Lacklon! Catch!
What happened here?
Half-off shots.
[laughs] And boom, down they went!
translation.fr: Et bim, ils étaient par terre !

translation.en: [sighs] You know, my wife's right. I just can't stay out of trouble.
translation.fr: Ma femme a raison.J'arrive pas à éviter les ennuis.

translation.en: [slamming table] Can you just stop?
You think you're all heroes, punching a couple of drunk Tevinters?
translation.fr: Vous vous prenez pour des hérosà frapper des ivrognes ?

translation.en: You think that did anything except risk our mission?
Neither did I.
[Miriam sighs] Come in.
Do you want to talk about it?
Because the bar fight might not have been the smartest idea, but--
translation.fr: La bagarre n'était peut-être pasune bonne idée, mais…

translation.en: I figured out a way into the palace.
That's… That's great.
Fairbanks, get in here!
What's wrong?
Everyone okay?
Miriam found a way for us to get into the palace.
translation.fr: Miriam a trouvé un moyend'entrer au palais.

translation.en: [Miriam] The only way in.
It's me. There's an old escape tunnel intended for The Divine himself.
translation.fr: C'est moi. Il y a un vieux tunneldestiné au Divin lui-même.

translation.en: I cleared the outer entrance,
but the inner one can only be opened from the inside.
translation.fr: mais je n'ai pas accèsau côté intérieur.

translation.en: No. You do not have to do this.
translation.fr: Non. Tu n'as pas à faire ça.

translation.en: [chuckles dryly] Oh, trust me, I don't want to, but…
you all stood up for me. In the stupidest way possible, but you did it,
translation.fr: mais vous m'avez défendue,même si c'était très stupide.

translation.en: and that means something.
Besides…
I really want that cheese farm.
If you don't come back,
I'll kill you myself.
Up-up-up. Don't use them all at once.
translation.fr: Ne les utilise pastous en même temps.

translation.en: That's more your problem than mine, ain't it?
translation.fr: C'est plus ton problème que le mien, non ?

translation.en: Thank you.
Just be there.
Where do you think you're going? -This has to be finished before-- -[dramatic sting]
translation.fr: Vous allez où ?Ça doit être fini avant…

translation.en: Forgive me. On your way.
Come back later.
Hey, I said-- [yelps]
We're in.
